resources.string:
Based on your current pay and past expenses, it appears that you've been managing your finances responsibly. However, considering your financial situation, I would advise you to prioritize saving up for the time being.

 I recommend creating a monthly budget that includes a designated amount for savings. Aim to save a portion of your income consistently, even if it's a small amount initially. Over time, you can gradually increase your savings contributions as your financial situation improves.

By prioritizing saving now, you're laying a solid foundation for your future financial well-being.
